title: Identification of LIMs
fullText:
Each LIM shall be identified, in accordance with Clause 2.12.1â€”
(a)	to indicate the associated distribution board and its circuit breaker; and
(b)	with an additional identifier unique to the patient area, e.g. 'LIM X'.
NOTE: The LIM may be combined with the overload monitor required by Clause 2.9.4.
